workflow.name: CCP Tenant Clust_1wyaAp
workflow.title: CCP Tenant Clust_1wyaAp
workflow.description: Workflow to create New Workflow for WM

properties.description: This workflow is the main workflow that will get triggered when the Application Profile "K8TenantCluster" is deployed.

properties.script:
#!/bin/bash

export TOKEN=$(curl -v -k -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded" -d "username=$workflow.definition_workflow_01CXXPBHHNYVV4kICf7BWd5tGQDMMcU49CT.input.variable_workflow_01CY1369CRZTS504FYbKlXbShQput5PsOEp$&password=$workflow.definition_workflow_01CXXPBHHNYVV4kICf7BWd5tGQDMMcU49CT.input.variable_workflow_01D197DXHNV684Je7lh2z9LPhaAc471jcvd$"  $workflow.definition_workflow_01CXXPBHHNYVV4kICf7BWd5tGQDMMcU49CT.input.variable_workflow_01CY0F2RFDGP81cg8okdLCW57T4Qy30vF2G$/v3/system/login 2> >(grep X-Auth-Token) | grep X-Auth-Token | awk -F ":" '{print $2}' | tr -d '\n\r' )
sleep 10
curl -ksSL --request GET -H "X-Auth-Token":"$TOKEN" $workflow.definition_workflow_01CXXPBHHNYVV4kICf7BWd5tGQDMMcU49CT.input.variable_workflow_01CY0F2RFDGP81cg8okdLCW57T4Qy30vF2G$/v3/clusters/$workflow.definition_workflow_01CXXPBHHNYVV4kICf7BWd5tGQDMMcU49CT.input.variable_workflow_01CXZ5Z1TN23C0P994lnv0lIbJHbruwP6oc$ | jq -r '.kubeconfig' | sed 's/\\n/\n/g' > ~/KUBECONFIG.yaml
sleep 10
export KUBECONFIG=~/KUBECONFIG.yaml
export NAMESPACE=default
export SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME=cloudcenter

kubectl get nodes -o wide >/tmp/output.log
kubectl create serviceaccount $SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME -n $NAMESPACE >>/tmp/output.log
sleep 10
kubectl create clusterrolebinding ccs-sa --clusterrole=cluster-admin --serviceaccount=$NAMESPACE:$SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME >>/tmp/output.log
sleep 10
export SECRET_NAME=$(kubectl get serviceaccount $SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME -n $NAMESPACE -o 'jsonpath={.secrets[0].name}' 2>/dev/null )
sleep 10
export K8_TOKEN=$(kubectl get secret $SECRET_NAME -n $NAMESPACE -o "jsonpath={.data.token}" | base64 -d  )
sleep 10
export K8_APISERVER=$(cat $KUBECONFIG | grep "server:" | awk -F " " '{print $2}' )
sleep 10
echo  $K8_APISERVER#$K8_TOKEN

export KUBECONFIG=~/KUBECONFIG.yaml; kubectl get secrets $activity.definition_activity_014UR17LAR1N81NYOXan80MrIiDHpMi6ZwL.output.result_string$ -o json | jq -Mr '.data.token' | base64 -d
